name: Refresh
description:
You are stuck in a void prison, the only way out is through three trials that will test your reflexes. reaction time, patience, and knowledge of the mechanics. Succeed in this and the warden of the prison will see you for the final battle to determine if you are to escape or forever stay imprisoned in the land of nothing.

Controls

  • A - Move Left
  • D - Move Right
  • LeftClick - Shoot
  • Space - Jump
  • Esc - Pause/Resume

Changes

  • The aiming system for the weapon allows for physics-based kills.
  • The boss moves much faster now, giving the player less time to react.
  • There are now two walls that can instantly kill both the player and the enemy.
  • The HUD bar was scaled to make it fit the health and ammo text
  • The Controls were added in the How To Play section
